column5: so, going back to you mr. burbank here. so you say that you're a traditionalist. so you know, historically until 1913 members of congress were not elected by by you and me, right? they were elected by their state governments and it wasn't until 1913 when we actually swift, you know, switched over to directly, electing our congressional leaders, right? that's why you have these rules in place that you can't do it proportionally. so, i
